entry.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine Maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 23, 21:00 - 22:00 UTC

Sep 25, 07:15 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 23/10/2023 21:00 UTC
End time : 23/10/2023 22:00 UTC
Service impact : Console User Interface will be unavailable during about 1 minute on ovhcloud-fr-1.webpaas.ovh.net.
Service improvement : Our partner will be doing a routine maintenance on OVHCLOUD-FR-1 region to release an underlying software upgrade. All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade.
